name: Mount Ascend Online Game | Construct 3
description:
Shepherd Games offers you Mount Ascend, a realtime online multiplayer racing game.

Features

  • Realtime multiplayer
    • Need atleast two players available online
  • Free upgrades
  • Try the demo before you download it
  • Easily to implement
  • No Shepherd Games' splash screen
  • Game is well coded 
  • UI is properly aligned
  • Easy to reskin
  • One source code to support multiple platforms
    1. Android
    2. iOS
    3. Windows Phone
    4. Windows Desktop
    5. Mac
    6. Linux
    7. Facebook Instant Games
    8. HTML

Source code folder contains 

  • Construct 3 project file
  • HTML export with no Shepherd Games' splash screen
  • Guidelines with screenshots

For any support or queries, you may reach out to us at our Discord channel or write to contact@shepherd.games

If you don't want to purchase the Construct 3 subscription or have trouble with installation and customization, don't worry we will help you for a very low price.

Support us on PayPal | Patreon | BuyMeACoffee

Download Source Codes | Premium Assets 

Consider supporting my work, helps me to develop more assets and games for you
